snippet: The films “Pather Panchali,” “Aparajito” and “The World of Apu” entranced audiences, garnered awards and earned the Indian director the respect of his more famous peers.
abstract: Three Satyajit Ray films known as the Apu Trilogy have been painstakingly restored by Criterion Collection in collaboration with Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences and will be rereleased in theaters across United States; trilogy consists of films Pather Panchali, Aparajito and The World of Apu, and has received praise from John Huston, Martin Scorsese as well as other film world luminaries.
lead_paragraph: The films “Pather Panchali,” “Aparajito” and “The World of Apu” entranced audiences, garnered awards and earned the Indian director the respect of his more famous peers.

headline.main: Restored Apu Trilogy Returns Satyajit Ray’s Humane Work to Theaters
headline.print_headline: A Humane Lens on the Rawness of Life
